_source.text: 6. Hermans L, Deblander A, Dekeyser P, Scheys I, Lesaffre E, Westelinck KJ "At equipotent doses, isradipine is better tolerated than amlodipine in patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension: a double-blind, randomized, parallel-group study."

text: , **isradipine** **is** **better** tolerated than **amlodipine** in patients with mild-to-moderate hypertension: a double-blind, randomized, parallel-group study."

_source.text: According to my research, Nystatin is also supposed to work better than the "Azole" drugs (ketoconazole, clotrimazole, fluconazole) on resistant strains of yeast - I suspect glabrata yeast.

text: According to my research, **Nystatin** is also supposed to work **better** **than** the "Azole" drugs
(**ketoconazole**, clotrimazole, fluconazole) on resistant strains of yeast - I suspect glabrata yeast.
